fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport
head_office_address: HQ, Clippers Quay The Quays, Salford
eu_initiatives: Customs Connect provides customs and trade advisory services to the private sector. For our clients we follow policy developments in the areas, a.o., of Customs, Trade, Security and Brexit. Specific policies and/or proposal of interest are, a.o., trade agreements, Customs classification , supply chain security as well as Brexit and customs. In these areas we give feedback on proposals or roadmaps as well suggest legislation changes ( eg. customs classification). We also do represent our clients to the EU institutions in areas which are of interest to them and/or will affect their business. This can be via position papers, specific views or meetings.
membership: British Chamber of Commerce to Belgium
relevant_communication: Organise periodic events, give feedback on proposals and publish white papers, not only in writing but also via social media.
goals__remit: Customs Connect is an award winning opportunities and strategy focused Customs  and Trade Consultancy that continues to invest heavily in extending our range of value added services, geographical reach and software platforms to support our clients.
